name: Covid Capture!
description: Covid Capture! is a simple little game that allows the user to take out all of their anger on this nasty Covid Virus! Since people have been stuck inside I figured what better way to release some pent up anger or energy than to destroy some nasty viruses and bacteria! This game is a 2D shooter that allows the user to control a character (bandage) and shoot at incoming waves of viruses. The user can take damage and will lose lives if they let viruses past them. After 5 lives are lost or the user takes enough damage the game ends. The goal is to try and see how high you can get on rounds. Good luck!
